name: Lionbars
body:
LionBars
========

A free to use, lightweight jQuery plugin that makes scrollbars look like in OSX Lion - based on Nikolay Dyankov original work.

How to use
----------

 - include css et js files
 - simply use lionbars method on the div(s) you want

Example :
```javascript
$(function() {
  $('.overflowed').lionbars();
});
```
 - that's it !
tagline: A free to use, lightweight jQuery plugin that makes scrollbars look like in OSX Lion - based on Nikolay Dyankov original work.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
